title: Which watch should I buy, a smartwatch or a hybrid watch and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both a smart watch and a hybrid watch have their own worth. It remains on you which one you should buy. If you are a fan of modern watchmaking, then you can like a smart watch. It is similar to peripherals like computer. A hybrid watch is a bit different than a smart watch. It looks conventional and works like a smart watch. So, you cannot differ these watches from a luxury watch. Both of these are fashionable in nature.
